useCases.headline: From Repetitive Tasks to Strategic Momentum
useCases.description: Automate everything from lead research and social media content pipelines to customer onboarding sequences. Free your team to focus on high-impact work that drives growth, while habfract handles the operational load.

testimonial.quote: Habfract took over 20 hours of weekly manual work from my marketing team in the first month. We're now focused on strategy, not spreadsheets.

link.text: See how Innovate Co scaled their marketing

useCases.headline: Your Personal Operations Team, in Your Pocket
useCases.description: Build systems to manage your personal brand, automate content repurposing across platforms, or even organize your research. The habfract app acts as your always-on assistant, turning your creative habits into a powerful engine for growth.

testimonial.quote: As a solo creator, I was drowning in admin. Habfract now runs my content distribution and email newsletter. It's like having a team of three working for me 24/7.
We used to think scaling operations meant scaling headcount. Habfract proved us wrong.

tiers.name: System
tiers.description: For organizations building core business functions on AI.

faq.question: What is an agentic workflow?
faq.answer: An agentic workflow is a series of tasks carried out by one or more AI agents to achieve a specific goal. You can choose from our pre-built workflows (like 'Post daily on social media') or work with us to create a custom one for your unique needs.

faq.question: How does the 'human-in-the-loop' feature work?
faq.answer: You can set specific checkpoints within any workflow where an agent must pause and wait for your approval via the mobile app. This ensures you have final say on critical actions, like sending an important email or publishing content.

faq.question: Can I try habfract before committing?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer a consultation to understand your needs and can set up a proof-of-concept workflow for qualified businesses to demonstrate the value before you subscribe to a plan.

faq.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer: All plans come with access to our support resources. The Momentum plan includes priority email support, and the System plan provides you with a dedicated automation expert to help you build and maintain your workflows.

faq.question: Is my company's data secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security protocols to ensure your data is encrypted and secure. We are committed to maintaining the privacy and integrity of your information. You own your data, always.
